text: Andrea Manfredi (10 February 1992 – 29 October 2018) was an Italian cyclist, who competed for amateur team Palazzago. Manfredi was one of 189 killed onboard Lion Air Flight 610 when it crashed into the Java Sea shortly after takeoff. ==Major results== 2012 3rd Giro della Valle d'Aosta 2nd stage ==References== ==External links== * Category:1992 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Italian male cyclists Category:People from Massa Category:Victims of aviation accidents or incidents in Indonesia Category:Victims of aviation accidents or incidents in 2018
title: Andrea Manfredi
